we.should.database

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • we.should.database.DBHelper

  • public class DBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Helper object to create, open, and/or manage a database.
    Author:
    UW CSE403 SP12

        java.lang.String name,
        CursorFactory factory,
        int version)
        Construct DBHelper object
        Parameters:
        context - to use to open or create the database
        name - of database to open
        factory - to use for creating cursor objects, or null for the default
        version - number of database

      • createTables

        public void createTables(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Create all tables required for WeShould application. Requires that the tables do not currently exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        db - name of database to create tables in

      • rebuild

        public void rebuild(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Rebuild database - drops all tables and recreates them **All data will be lost
        Parameters:
        db - name of database
